errorCodes.flow-0001: The user doesn't have the required capability/role to perform the requested action.
errorCodes.flow-2000: Missing flow-package field in the flow import operation
errorCodes.flow-2001: Either the flow package is not a valid zip format or it's an empty zip
errorCodes.flow-2002: Failed to validate the zip content. Invalid flow package
errorCodes.flow-2003: flow-definition.json file is missing in the flow package
errorCodes.flow-2004: Unexpected error while parsing the flow-definition.json file
errorCodes.flow-2008: Unexpected error while parsing the flow resource
errorCodes.flow-2011: Execution phase missing in flow package
errorCodes.flow-3002: Flow doesn't have an active version
errorCodes.flow-3015: Server encountered error while connecting with DB
errorCodes.unknown: Encountered an unknown error while importing flow
errorCodes.flow-execution-2100: A valid flow instance name is required and can't be null

errorCodes.flow-execution-2102: No flow found with the specified flow id
errorCodes.flow-execution-2181: You do not have all the capabilities required to execute this flow. Do you still want to continue?
